Title: Maladolescenza
Writer: Peter Berling, Dieter Geissler (dialogue), Barbara Alberti (Italian version), Amedeo Pagani (Italian version), Pier Giuseppe Murgia (screenplay: Italian version), Dezsö Kosztolányi (poem), Edith Bruck (translation)
Actors: Lara Wendel, Eva Ionesco, Martin Loeb
Plot: A teen boy grows from playing and fighting with his German-shepherd dog, to playing kids and adult games with two equally young girls, in a dream-like forest which eventually turns eerie, and somber.
